title: Person of Interest - The Cast on the Big Character Death
author: IGN
comment: Bring her back!! I only watched to see the relationship between Carter and Reese!! Reese was human around her.
I loved what Jim said about Taraji!!!! Great Chemistry!!
Carter is gone, but not forgotten.  And missed every episode from here on.  She "got" John right from their first scene together, and he knew it.  A great relationship.  Thanks, Taraji!!

This was such an amazing episode and it is an amazing show. It has evolved to a part of my life in the past 3 year. I did not see this ending coming. My jaw dropped and I was so shocked and became teary eyed. I love this show
damn im going to miss her
description: The Person of Interest cast discuss the huge character death that occurred in the November 19th episode, "The Crossing."
